Just set up data and run basic mash
```{r}
  library("mashr2")
  set.seed(1)
  sim_data = simple_sims(1000,5,1)
  data = set_mash_data(sim_data$Bhat,sim_data$Shat)
 
  m.1by1 = mash_run_1by1_new(data)
  strong = get_significant_results(m.1by1)
  
  U.dd = cov_data_driven(data)
  m.dd = mash_new(data,U.dd)
   m.dd$loglik
```

```{r}
  U.pc = data2cov_pca(data,5,strong)
  m.pc = mash_new(data,U.pc)

  m.pc$loglik
```
